metadata.title: LEX 365 2-Pack Insulated Stainless Steel Wine Tumbler Set with Lid and Straw 12 oz Stemless Wine Glass, Thermal Cup, Modern Colored Wine Glasses for Coffee or Wine Enthusiasts.
features: Camping Friendly: The Lex 365 2-Pack Insulated Stainless Steel Wine Tumbler Set is perfect for camping and outdoor activities, as its double wall insulation keeps drinks cold or hot for hours.
Perfect Sized Tumblers: Each tumbler holds 12 oz of your favorite beverage and has a stainless steel construction for maximum durability and temperature control.
The modern colored wine tumblers feature vibrant designs that can be used at any occasion - perfect as a wine gifts for outdoor use, or even a stainless steel tumbler for travel purposes.
Ideal for comfortably sipping your favorite beverages whether its coffee, tea, or a full-bodied wine - the insulated thermal cup keeps it's temperature up to 8 hours.
The set of 2 stainless steel wine glasses are part of a bulk purchase and make the perfect gift - the colored wine glasses with stems add fun and sophistication to any happy hour!
description: Healthy, Eco-Friendly and Stylish - Get ready to discover the perfect way to enjoy your favorite wine no matter where you are with LEX 365 Insulated Stainless Steel Wine Tumbler with Lid and Straw 12oz Set of 2. This stemless wine glass is both made of high-quality stainless steel that's free of BPA and toxins, while a special insulated keeps hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold. Bring style wherever you go - Not only is this great for staying healthy and eco-friendly, but its classic design makes sure you look great too! Sleek look, and matching lid and straw included, this wine tumbler with lid looks like the cutest stemless wine glasses bulk anywhere. Perfect for any occasion from picnics in the park to nights out on the town. Upgraded insulation technology - Enjoy your coffee tumblers with lids even more when using our effective insulation technology! Keep it cool or keep it warm – it can last up 8 hours so feel free to stay on vacation mode all day without having to refill it. Finally, an insulated cup that won’t let you down no matter where life takes you. Get yours today for yourself or give this as beautiful wine gifts for women – it will definitely be the best modern wine gift around!
